verses.verse: Thus <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> that <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6213>performed<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H9608>finished.<s%> And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> in the things that <S%H1732>David<s%> his father had <S%H1>dedicated,<s%> even the <S%H6944>silver<s%> and the <S%H3701>gold<s%> and <S%H2091>all<s%> the <S%H3605>utensils,<s%> [and] <S%H3627>put<s%> [them] in the <S%H5414>treasuries<s%> of the <S%H214>house<s%> of <S%H1004>God.<s%>

<S%H227>Then<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes,<s%> the <S%H5387>leaders<s%> of the fathers' [households] of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H5927>bring<s%> up the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> themselves to the <S%H4428>king<s%> at the <S%H2282>feast,<s%> that is [in] the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>
Then <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H5375>took<s%> up the <S%H727>ark.<s%>

And they <S%H5927>brought<s%> up the <S%H727>ark<s%> and the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3627>utensils<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> [were] in the <S%H168>tent;<s%> the <S%H3881>Levitical<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5927>brought<s%> them up.

And <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> who were <S%H3259>assembled<s%> with him <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> were <S%H2076>sacrificing<s%> so <S%H7230>many<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> that they could not be <S%H5608>counted<s%> or <S%H4487>numbered.<s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to its <S%H4725>place,<s%> into the <S%H1687>inner<s%> <S%H1687>sanctuary<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> to the <S%H6944>holy<s%> of <S%H6944>holies,<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubim.<s%>

For the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H6566>spread<s%> their <S%H3671>wings<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H727>ark,<s%> so that the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H3680>made<s%> a <S%H3680>covering<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> and its <S%H905>poles.<s%>

And the <S%H905>poles<s%> were so <S%H748>long<s%> that the <S%H7218>ends<s%> of the <S%H905>poles<s%> of the <S%H727>ark<s%> could be <S%H7200>seen<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H1687>inner<s%> <S%H1687>sanctuary,<s%> but they could not be <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H2351>outside;<s%> and they are <S%H8033>there<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H369>There<s%> was <S%H369>nothing<s%> in the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H7534>except<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> [there] at <S%H2722>Horeb,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a covenant with the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when they <S%H3318>came<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And when the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> from the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place (for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> who were <S%H4672>present<s%> had <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> themselves, <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H8104>regard<s%> to <S%H4256>divisions<s%>),

and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3881>Levitical<s%> <S%H7891>singers,<s%> <S%H623>Asaph,<s%> <S%H1968>Heman,<s%> <S%H3038>Jeduthun,<s%> and their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H251>kinsmen,<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H948>fine<s%> <S%H948>linen,<s%> with <S%H4700>cymbals,<s%> <S%H5035>harps,<s%> and <S%H3658>lyres,<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H4217>east<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and with them one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H2690>blowing<s%> <S%H2689>trumpets<s%>

in <S%H259>unison<s%> when the <S%H2689>trumpeters<s%> and the <S%H7891>singers<s%> were to <S%H8085>make<s%> themselves <S%H8085>heard<s%> with <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%> to <S%H1984>praise<s%> and to <S%H3034>glorify<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and when they <S%H7311>lifted<s%> up their <S%H6963>voice<s%> accompanied by <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> and <S%H4700>cymbals<s%> and <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H7892>music,<s%> and when they <S%H1984>praised<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> [saying, "][He] <S%H3588>indeed<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> for His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting,<s%>" then the <S%H1004>house,<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> was <S%H4390>filled<s%> with a <S%H6051>cloud,<s%>

so that the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H5975>stand<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> for the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>
